description:
SAP Products are used by over 13000 large companies around the globe. For logging into SAP systems, a GUI is a necessary desktop utility. Most companies will provide SAP GUI to end users to log on to the SAP ERP system. "SAP XPERT" has designed the course "SAP Logon: Features and Functions" to enable the learner to acquire the knowledge and get the experience of using SAP GUI 730, its features and functions.

For logging into SAP systems, a GUI is a necessary program or a desktop utility. Companies provide the SAP GUI to their users, both IT and non-IT, to log on to the SAP systems. Knowing how to best use this utility, you will be quick start your SAP journey and enhance SAP experience at work.

Course includes videos, simulations, hands-on practice and quiz. The best part of this course is that you don't need the SAP system to practice the content of course. Please allow pop-up while practicing the lessons.

  • Exercises included: 8
  • Estimated time to complete this course is 1 Hour and 15 Minutes.
title: SAP Log-on: Features & Functions
